message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on something really valuable. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate the opportunity, but I am only able to pay up to $100 for it. Would you be willing to adjust your price?

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I understand that $150 might be a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $125. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings.
